oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Fruit agroforestry in Provence : why ? how ?
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Degache, Françoise
Warlop, Francois
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Crop combinations and interactions
Farm economics
Social aspects
Biodiversity and ecosystem services
Crop health, quality, protection
Education, extension and communication
Landscape and recreation
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: This 11mn movie in french explains why agroforestry has been set in an agricultural school in Avignon, and to what extent it is an experimental device for pedagogical and scientific purposes. This plot takes part in a national project called SMART : www.agroforesterie.fr/smart
oai_dc:dc.dc:identifier: Degache, Françoise and Warlop, Francois (2014) Fruit agroforestry in Provence : why ? how ? Karine Ifourah.
